paper_abstract: Today, the safe use of mobile devices is a prerequisite for successful and transparent work, both on a personal and business level. The study presented in this paper shows that work safety in cyberspace depends on the users' knowledge of threats and their appropriate response to them. Based on the results, it has been established that user awareness should be raised, users should be informed of threats and undergo suitable education on work safety in cyberspace. paper_title: Safe use of mobile devices arises from knowing the threats
